TEXT.TITLE: BURNHAM SLEEPY HOLLOW <DOZEZ> CONVERTS TO CORP
TEXT.BODY: Partners of Burnham Sleepy Hollow Ltd said they voted to convert the limited partnership to a California corporation, called Burnham Pacific Properties Inc. The new corporation will become a real estate investment trust, effective March 31. Reuter
